title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a village in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a village by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a village in a dream and entering it indicates a high position in the ranks and that the dreamer will obtain a prominent position. To dream of a village with green valleys and beautiful lands, means kindness and great living. Also, dreaming of entering a village with old and demolished houses indicates worries and sorrows. Entering from a city to a village in a dream indicates that the dreamer will escape from difficult things and achieve his goals. Entering a village epidemic in a dream is one of the unwanted visions and indicative of disasters and misfortunes. Interpretation of a dream about a village for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a village for unmarried women is evidence that she You will move to a new life full of changes. Seeing entering an abandoned village in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that she will fail in life. Seeing a destroyed village in a dream is one of the unwanted visions and indicates the presence of corrupt people in one’s life. Also, dreaming of a woman leaving An unmarried woman coming to the village means that she will enjoy a new opportunity. Interpretation of a dream about a village for a married woman: The interpretation of seeing a woman entering a village with beautiful trees or palm trees in a dream indicates great wealth and children. Seeing a village inhabited by jinn in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the problems and difficulties that she is going through in her life. Dream interpretation The Abandoned VillageEntering an abandoned village in a dream is one of the unwanted visions and indicates extreme fatigue. Seeing a deserted and frightening village in a dream is evidence of sins and transgressions committed by the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about an unknown village: Seeing an unknown village in which there were familiar people in the dream indicates salvation from worries. And problems. Riding in an unknown village in a dream is a sign of great kindness and support that the dreamer will receive. Seeing unknown people in an unknown village in a dream means that you will face psychological problems. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of Experts will reply to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person eating meat in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person eating meat in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The science of dream interpretation is one of the sciences with which God Almighty distinguished our Master Joseph, peace be upon him. To be in the dream, with the exception of the difference in the dreamer’s condition from one person to another, and the interpretation may bring good news, or it may be a bad omen for the life of the dreamer, and in our article we will learn about different interpretations of the dream of a dead person eating meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin, in addition to his interpretation for a single woman. And married people.Interpretation of the dream of a dead person eating meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the leading scholars of interpretation, as he presented many explanations and explanations related to it. Interpretation of the dream of a dead person eating meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. We find that the interpretations either carry good news, or they can be a bad and ominous omen for the life of the dreamer. And we present to you some of those interpretations that were mentioned in this chapter, such as: Interpretation scholars continued their interpretation of this vision, that seeing a dead aunt eating in a dream at home is a sign of illness or disease affecting her. In addition, seeing a dead son and daughter eating with their parents indicates Indicates that large sums of money will be collected. Moreover, seeing a dead person eating with them in a dream symbolizes an imminent journey with the help of Almighty God. Also, dreaming of a dead wife eating food with her husband is a sign of the coming period. See also: Interpretation Dreaming about inserting a finger into the vagina in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and the single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person who wants to eat meat. It is one of the dreams that preoccupy many people’s minds, as a dream about a deceased person causes him anxiety and panic, which undoubtedly indicates that there are several pieces of evidence and interpretations regarding this matter, and we present to you Some of the interpretations of his dream about a dead person who wants to eat meat, according to what scholars narrated in the interpretation: Interpretation scholars believe that seeing a dead person eating meat in a dream, especially uncooked meat, is an unpleasant vision in the dream. In the context of the hadith, seeing a dead person eating meat in a dream is considered Evil, disease, misguidance, and distress. Also, in this dream, it is an indication that the deceased owed money before his death. In addition, the dream interpretation indicates that eating meat in a dream from the deceased is a bad omen. It also indicates that the dreamer needs to be careful. Interpretation A dream of a dead person eating meat in a dream for a single woman. There have been many interpretations and explanations by scholars about the dream of a dead person eating meat in a dream, depending on the social status he lives in, in addition to some hints and symbols present in the dream. Here are some of these explanations and interpretations: Interpretation scholars said: If an unmarried girl sees a dead person eating in a dream, this is a sign of longevity. In addition, it indicates an improvement in health conditions. As if a virtuous woman is going through a crisis and dreams that she is eating food with the dead, then this A sign of relief from distress and the end of worry, anxiety and worry. God Almighty is Most High and knows the unseen. We find that if an unmarried girl sees her aunt or uncle eating in a dream, this is a sign that she will get sick and sick, and God knows best. Watch.

title: Interpretation of seeing a refrigerator in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a refrigerator in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the refrigerator is one of the electrical appliances used to store food in it. Seeing it in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to protect and preserve some important things in his life. It also indicates the solutions of nourishment and kindness for the dreamer and his family members and obtaining a job and position that guarantees him a decent life. In addition to many different interpretations in different cases, and in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a refrigerator in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a refrigerator in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees that he is opening the refrigerator in a dream, this means that soon the doors of goodness will open. And life and happiness. If the dreamer sees that he closed the refrigerator door, this means that he will get a lot for a living. As for someone who sees the refrigerator empty and does not contain food, this means that the dreamer follows the teachings of his religion, and the dream is a sign of asceticism. If the dreamer sees that He opens a refrigerator with a lot of food in it, this is a sign that he will marry a beautiful girl or has good morals. Whoever sees a yellow refrigerator is a liar, a hypocrite, and a deceiver. And whoever sees a white refrigerator, this means the visionary’s diligence in his religion and worldly life. Seeing a red refrigerator in a dream It means that the dreamer follows his desires. Seeing a blue refrigerator for single people is a sign of the presence of a good girl or a good man, or in clearer terms, a sign of an upcoming marriage. Seeing a green refrigerator means a good person or a young man with good morals. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a refrigerator in a dream for a single woman varies. Dreaming about a refrigerator is about a single girl, and the most important information about this vision can be listed as follows: If an unmarried girl sees that she is buying a new refrigerator, this indicates that she will soon meet her life partner and have a successful and happy marriage. If a girl sees that she is opening a refrigerator that does not contain food, This means that she will face health problems that prevent her from having children. If an unmarried girl sees that she is opening a refrigerator with a lot of food in it, this means that after marriage she will give birth to good, healthy offspring. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a refrigerator in a dream for a pregnant woman. The dream interpretation of seeing a refrigerator in a dream varies depending on what If it is full or empty, but the refrigerator in general for a pregnant woman is an indication that the pregnant woman will give birth to a girl. Having a refrigerator without food, or in other words empty, means that you will face penalties during the delivery process. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a refrigerator in a dream for a married woman. The most important thing about seeing a refrigerator in a dream for a married woman can be identified through the following: A married woman’s vision of a white refrigerator shows that her heart is pure and sincere. And loyal to her husband and children, and that a white refrigerator in a married woman’s dream is a sign of a happy and stable life without marital problems and quarrels. A married woman who sees a white refrigerator full of raw meat will fall into a great misfortune that may be the death or betrayal of her husband. A married woman who sees a refrigerator full of cheese, yogurt, and milk is... Indicator of goodness

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about wearing makeup for a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman: Make-up tools and adornments are among the things that a woman uses to look more beautiful in front of those around her. There are countless types and a large number of interpretations that belong to major scholars and commentators, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman: A dream about applying makeup for a married woman in a dream There are many signs and associations that can be recognized through the following cases: Wearing makeup in a dream for a married woman indicates her intense love for her husband and her continuous effort to provide him comfort and happiness. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing makeup while she is angry, this symbolizes the problems and difficulties that You will face it in the near future. To dream of a married woman who wears makeup and is very beautiful, indicates the new stage that awaits her, full of happiness and prosperity in life. Interpretation of the dream of applying makeup for a married woman in Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained the interpretation of makeup for a married woman in a dream, and the following are some Interpretations received from him: Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a married woman wearing makeup in a dream as the death of anxiety and sadness and enjoying a calm and stable life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing makeup, this indicates a great deal of abundant livelihood and money that she will obtain in her life. Makeup in a dream indicates the relief that the dreamer will receive after the hardships he has suffered for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about putting makeup on a pregnant woman: During pregnancy, a woman sees many dreams with symbols that are difficult for her to interpret, so we will interpret seeing her putting makeup on in a dream as follows: Wearing makeup in a dream for a pregnant woman symbolizes the stress she is experiencing during this period and which is reflected in her dreams. If a pregnant woman in a dream is made up and made up, this symbolizes that God will give her a healthy male child. A pregnant woman puts large amounts of makeup on her face as a sign of That she will give birth to a girl will hinder her in the future. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing makeup in a dream and being happy means that her birth will be easy and she will be in good health. I dreamed that I was wearing makeup. If the dreamer is wearing makeup in the dream against her will, this symbolizes the outbreak of marital disputes and conflicts that may lead to Divorce, God forbid. Seeing the dreamer applying makeup in a bad way indicates the bad, unpleasant qualities that distinguish her and the need to change them and review herself. Interpretation of applying makeup powder in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who dreams of applying makeup powder on her face indicates the purity of her bed, good morals, and reputation. Goodness is among those who put her in a high position. If a woman sees that she is applying powder and decorating herself with it in a dream, and her face becomes beautiful, this symbolizes the goodness of her condition, her closeness to God, and the acceptance of her good deeds. Seeing a married woman wearing makeup in a dream means that her situation will change for the better, She will move to live at a high social level and will succeed

title: Interpretation of seeing the noon prayer in a dream - noon prayer on Friday in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the noon prayer in a dream is considered one of the good interpretations in religion and the world of the dreamer, according to the interpretations of some of its interpreters. Complete his obedience.Interpretation of seeing the noon prayer in a dream. Many people seek to know the interpretation of seeing the noon prayer in a dream, and many translators have interpreted the vision of the noon prayer for the pioneer according to his interpretation and different circumstances, and we present it to you as follows: The vision of the noon prayer according to Ibn Sirin explains that the reward of the dreamer It depends on the weather condition. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi interpreted it as revealing what is hidden, and that he obtains what he wants on the condition that the prayer is complete and correct. Delaying the noon prayer is evidence of the delayed repentance of the Prophet, and God knows best. Seeing the dreamer himself praying with the people in front of the noon prayer symbolizes the dreamer’s high status. Among the people. If the dreamer sees himself praying the noon prayer in the church, this is evidence that he enjoins what is right and forbids what is wrong. When the dreamer sees the noon prayer in the mosque, this vision symbolizes his marriage, and God knows best. If the fortuneteller performs the noon prayer at home, this is a sign of Others visit him at his home and receive them well. Interpretation of the vision of the noon prayer according to some interpreters: Seeing the noon prayer in a dream is one of the visions that causes anxiety for some and has many connotations, including these interpretations: Seeing the imposed prayer in a dream symbolizes his effort to achieve his desires and dreams, and among these dreams are Gaining money and livelihood. If the dreamer sees that he is praying on a cloudy day and at sunset in his dream, this is evidence that he did things against his will and feels upset about them. Seeing the dreamer performing the noon prayer in a dream indicates the dreamer’s war against the devils and all his whisperings. When the dreamer sees Using purified water in his ablution to perform the noon prayer, this indicates that God repents with him and enjoys it with a good intention and a pure heart, and God knows best. The pilgrim’s prostration during the noon prayer for a long period in a dream symbolizes that God will grant him long life and grant him health and well-being. If the dreamer sees himself praying in the sanctuary Mecca, the vision indicates his adherence to God and the Sunnah of His Messenger, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about prayer for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about noon prayer on Friday. I am happy that your dreams give you good news and that you pray on the day of the Islamic holiday, so your condition will change from all kinds of evil to all kinds of good. However, if the weather is cloudy, the dreamer may suffer from some sorrows and worries that will disappear with lightning speed. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about Friday in a dream. Appearance in a dream. In a word, whoever sees a dream in his sleep at noon, it indicates the divine nature, which is destiny and moderation, and that he is the owner of those pure and clear qualities. Which does not involve deception or lack of transparency. Therefore, you must maintain these good qualities. But if he sees that the noon time has changed to sunset or dinner time, the dreamer may change his condition slightly from relief to distress and some problems, worries and sorrows may occur to him. Read also: Dream interpretation of prayer in a dream. In conclusion, we have explained the interpretations. Some interpreters regarding the interpretation of seeing the noon prayer in a dream according to the different interpretation of the dreamer, and they are

title: Interpretation of a Muslim in a dream: seeing an infidel enter Islam

preview.html: We present to you the entry into Islam, the call to God, the peace of a person with my hand, I invite someone to Islam, the dream of embracing Islam, the interpretation of the dream of seeing Islam, Professor Abu Saad, may God have mercy on him, said: Any polytheist who sees himself in a dream, or someone else sees him as if he is in Paradise, or wearing silver bracelets, is subject to the Almighty’s saying: Interpretation of a Muslim entering Islam or embracing Islam in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is embracing Islam and declaring his conversion to Islam in a dream, then his vision shows the strength of his faith and the uprightness of his religion, and that this dreamer will be blessed with insight that will guide him to the straight path, God willing, in real life from calamities and distress, and peace from Illnesses, illnesses, problems, and disturbances of circumstances. Interpretation of an infidel or polytheist entering Islam or embracing Islam in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing one of the infidels convert to Islam in a dream, or that this infidel descends to the Qiblah, or that he glorifies and thanks God who has come from God with Islam, then . This vision shows his death and his transition to the afterlife, and the infidel who sees himself or sees others while he is in Paradise in a dream, or that he entered one of the fortresses, then this vision shows that this person is the true Islam. In fact, he sincerely repents to God and follows the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. And if the infidel sees in his dream, or someone else sees him, that he is dead in his dream, but his soul returns to life in the dream, then this dream is an indication of the conversion of the prophets to Islam or that. In reality, if a person sees in his dream that he is riding a ship in the sea, he enters Islam. It was said: Whoever sees that a polytheist has converted to Islam and speaks of death, this indicates his death in the religion of Islam. If a polytheist sees that he has converted to Islam, and sees that he is praying towards the Qiblah, or sees that he is thankful to God. Almighty, may God guide him to Islam, and if he is in the house of polytheism, and he sees it in his country. She dreams that he has converted to a house of Islam and then dies soon. And if a Muslim dreams that he has converted to Islam again, then he is safe from the worst, and every polytheist who sees himself in a dream or sees someone else as if he is in Paradise, or who wears silver bracelets, then he will embrace. The religion of Islam. And whoever sees: one of the polytheists as if he were dead, then he is alive, then he converts to Islam. Likewise, if he sees his chest, or sees himself in a ship at sea, then he has converted to Islam, and whoever gives the two testimonies. From the people of a non-Muslim in a dream was freed from his distress or led him after his choice, if he was chosen, and if he was forced, then something forbidden happened, and if he was an apostate while he was awake and saw in a dream that he narrated the two testimonies, or he returned to his parents after leaving them, or he returned to the place he left him. Or to the purpose of his action, whether he is a Muslim who bears witness to the truth or is known for his honesty. And whoever sees that he is a polytheist repents to God. Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, narrated that a Muslim who sees in his dream, whether male or female, converts to Islam again and says: I have converted to Islam. His vision shows kindness, justice, uprightness, closeness to God Almighty, and his sincerity, and the worries and success that this person finds in reality, and in some other narrations mentioned by Imam Ibn Sirin in interpreting this condition, indicate that it indicates: health, safety, and freedom from distress and distress.
preview.text: We present to you the entry into Islam, the call to God, the peace of a person with my hand, I invite someone to Islam, the dream of embracing Islam, the interpretation of the dream of seeing Islam, Professor Abu Saad, may God have mercy on him, said: Any polytheist who sees himself in a dream, or someone else sees him as if he is in Paradise, or wearing silver bracelets, is subject to the Almighty’s saying: Interpretation of a Muslim entering Islam or embracing Islam in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is embracing Islam and declaring his conversion to Islam in a dream, then his vision shows the strength of his faith and the uprightness of his religion, and that this dreamer will be blessed with insight that will guide him to the straight path, God willing, in real life from calamities and distress, and peace from Illnesses, illnesses, problems, and disturbances of circumstances. Interpretation of an infidel or polytheist entering Islam or embracing Islam in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing green parsley in a dream in detail

preview.html:
I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of the vision in a dream in detail Green parsley, which is one of the signs of abundant goodness because it is characterized by purity and very goodness and is green. Follow with us the interpretation of seeing parsley in a dream through your favorite Dream Interpretation website, which works to provide what you are looking for to interpret your vision. Interpretation of a dream about parsley For a single woman: The interpretation of a dream about parsley for a single woman indicates an abundance of goodness and vitality in the future, and many praises for good deeds in the future. If you dream of leafy vegetables such as parsley, etc., this means, in any case, recreating circumstances and a life full of fun and enjoyment. In case it was An unmarried girl is suffering from an illness, which is a sign of recovery, God willing. When you see parsley and buy it, it means that you will get money and great benefit. Interpretation of a dream about parsley for a married woman: On a general level, dreaming about one of the natural elements that is very useful to a person in waking life fits within the context of interpretation Positive for mental and physical health, especially parsley because of the concepts of pleasure and joy it brings. In the dream. Lady. Corn If you see her drinking water with parsley or preparing it, this is an excellent indicator of the speed of recovery. The diseases they suffer from, even chronic mental illnesses such as depression.
There are many visions like constant feuilles of the soul, this is in psychology, which indicates the presence of a positive force of a positive nature at the level of the subconscious mind, which comes with comfort. Interpretation of a dream about parsley for a pregnant woman in the event that she is pregnant and seeing parsley is evidence of Her physical health and the health of the fetus. This is what scholars have confirmed in the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, as it indicates the existence of a positive compatibility between psychological and stable marital life. The interpretation of parsley if it is grown or present in abundant quantities inside the house testifies to the goodness of the home. Interpretation of a dream about parsley by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about parsley. As convincing evidence of the ability to succeed and excel in all areas of life and overcome difficulties in an appropriate manner, but after going through many psychological obstacles and continuing to try to overcome them. He explained that it is a state of psychological and familial calm that passes through marital and family life, which helps bring relationships closer together, which It helps spread an atmosphere of lasting happiness, and God knows best. He explained the condition of people who consume fresh parsley as evidence that he will enjoy a long life with complete well-being and physical health that will take him beyond the stages of family solidarity on which he depends. He returned to some interpretations of a dream about parsley that it shows the reality of a person who can be relied upon. He is committed to religious matters and works hard to preserve the religious heritage. If you have a vision that you would like to explain, do not hesitate to put your comment in the comments box at the bottom of the article. We also invite you to follow our pages on social media.

title: Interpretation of a dream about silence in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a mask in a dream: It is a vision that does not bode well, as some jurists say, and as the dreamer sees it in a dream. You may also be interested in entering the house of the dead in a dream. But this vision indicates important meanings and can bring evidence about many things that happen in the life of the dreamer, and the vision varies. According to the events narrated by the dreamer, in this article we will talk about this vision and whatever it is. Related to analysis. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a muzzle in a dream. In this paragraph we will show you complete interpretations about the interpretation of seeing a muzzle in a dream. All the meanings of this vision: Seeing a mute person in a dream means corruption or defects in religion. If a person sees himself in a dream and becomes... Being mute, it means that he is cursing the Companions, may God be pleased with them, and insulting them, or that he is talking about people and making them angry. A man who sees a mute voice in his dream means that he will lose his job. As for a woman who sees in her dream that she is deaf, this means that she will have a lot of money. If the dreamer sees That he cannot speak or his tongue is tied, it means that he will become eloquent. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream that her tongue is tied means that she will get a lot of nourishment. A person who sees himself in a dream that he has become stupid indicates the defeat of his enemies. The dreamer seeing in a dream that he is speaking Seeing a mute person means that there will be changes in his life. Seeing a mute person speaking in a dream means that the dreamer will raise his status in life, and God knows best. Seeing a mute person who does not want to talk to you indicates misfortunes or misfortunes on your way, and God knows best. Seeing a mute person who does not want to talk to you indicates misfortunes or calamities on your way, and God knows best. A voice in a dream means that the dreamer is gossiping and lying about people. Seeing the dreamer turning into a mute person indicates that he is bearing false witness. Talking to a mute person in a dream indicates that kindness and blessing have reached the dreamer. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of a vision. Being mute in an unmarried girl’s dream. In this paragraph we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a muzzle in a dream for a single girl. It could be a vision of good or evil. As we will explain to you: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she has become silent, that is, she cannot speak or hear, this means that she is defending herself. It protects itself from the enemies around it. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a person who does not speak, then this vision indicates that there is a person in her life that she needs to take care of, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a person who only hears, then this vision It indicates that there are foolish people in her life and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Backgrounds in a dream Interpretation of seeing silence in a married woman’s dream Now in this paragraph we talk about the most important interpretations Interpretation of seeing a mask in a dream For married people: A married woman seeing a mute person in a dream is evidence that she is hiding some Problems in her life and she does not tell anyone about them, and God knows best. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she cannot speak and cannot hear, this is a sign that she will be saved and saved from enemies and problems in her life. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a witch or sorceress in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a witch or a sorceress in a dream A dream to see a sorcerer or an antichrist from Nabulsi, meanings of a dream about a sorcerer or an antichrist in a dream for men and women Interpretation of a dream to see a sorcerer or a sorceress in a dream Learn more on the Moments website. Interpretation of a dream to see a sorcerer or the antichrist from Nabulsi says Al-Nabulsi, in his interpretation, that he sees the Antichrist in a dream. He is a deceitful and unjust ruler who does not fulfill his promises. He has bad followers, and the Antichrist shows the dominance of the enemy or perhaps an invasion of the city of disbelief, and he shows worry, strife, injustice, and the weakness of those who accompanied him in the dream. Whereas the magician in a dream is a charming man. And if the sorcerer performs his magic with an apple, he will seduce his son, and if he sorcerers with a butterfly, he will seduce his wife. The antichrist in the book of Nabulsi in the dream refers to fun, mockery, and play, and the antichrist may have referred to the adulteress or that she is a maid. The repercussions of the dream of the sorcerer or the antichrist on men and women. Sorcerers Charlatans are evil and may carry lies, so seeing these people in a dream has a special interpretation for you according to his vision of the dream and its situation. These points in the interpretation of a dream about a magician and charlatans, we will direct you through the “Konuzi” website to obtain any valuable information. Whoever sees a magician in his dream indicates that The dreamer is arrogant, and arrogance has entered his heart, or he may be a liar, so this person seeks forgiveness from God and follows the path of repentance. Seeing a magician in a dream indicates the temptation that surrounds this person and he must beware of it. And if he sees that the magician is performing magic far from the dreamer , he will obtain goodness, and perhaps this is evidence of his travels that make him happy and indicate a noble work. And whoever dreams that he turns into a magician, this heralds goodness or he will gain great fame among people by doing good deeds. And if in a dream he performs destructive acts that turn him into a magician, this indicates That a person will turn away from his dream and destroy it himself. And whoever is able in his dream to put people under the influence of his magic will raise his status and reveal to him something that will benefit his life and his strength. If a person falls under the influence of a magician or a priest, then his interpretation is based on the evil that he encounters on his way. Interpretation of a dream about seeing A witch or a sorcerer for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant sorcerer and falling under his influence indicates faltering in childbirth or the pain that will accompany her during her birth. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sorcerer or a sorcerer for a pregnant woman. When an unmarried woman sees a sorcerer and falls under his influence, someone will deceive her and fear for her honor and reputation. If you see a sorcerer in A dream, and you felt happy and wished you would become like him, then fads and illusions will offend you. It can lead him to distrust and he can show his envy of someone who is better than him at work and it will hurt him. A magician in a dream for a married woman distinguishes between spouses, separation between them, and discord in their lives.
